mainDressCode.title: Dress Code
mainDressCode.description: Strictly formal. No slippers, shorts, jeans, tshirt, or white color. Colors: brown, black, teal green, blue, gray, or beige only.

sections.title: FORMAL ATTIRE
sections.description: Strictly formal. No slippers, shorts, jeans, tshirt, or white color. Colors: brown, black, teal green, blue, gray, or beige only.
